name: GEORGETOWN RAIL EQUIPMENT
sampleDescriptions: Support HR 721 and S 407 to permanently extend the short line railroad tax credit. Support H.R. 1892, P.L. 115-123 to extend the short line railroad tax credit for fiscal year 2017.
